articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Eq. Guinea President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Eq. Guinea President
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo upon his reelection as President of Equatorial Guinea.
					Kim said in the message that his reelection as President of Equatorial Guinea is an expression of its people's high trust in him.
					
					Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Equatorial Guinea would continue to grow stronger in the future, too, Kim sincerely wished the President great success in his noble work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Thai King
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Thai King 
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Bhumibol Adulyadej, King of Thailand, on the occasions of his birthday and its national day.
					Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Thailand would grow stronger on good terms and wished the King good health and happiness and the Thai people development and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Thai PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Thai PM
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Kim Yong Il Saturday sent a message of greetings to Thai Prime Minister Abhisit Vejjajiva on the occasion of the national day of the Kingdom of Thailand.
					Wishing the Prime Minister and the government of Thailand successes in their work for political stability and sustained economic development of the country, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK SPA Delegation Leaves for Indonesia
articles.content:
DPRK SPA Delegation Leaves for Indonesia
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme Peopleâ€™s Assembly led by its Vice-Chairman Kim Wan Su left here on Saturday to attend the 4th Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly to be held in Indonesia.

articles.title: KPA Ensemble Performs in China
articles.content:
KPA Ensemble Performs in China
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble on a visit to China gave a performance for guests of honor at the Liaoning Great Hall of the People in Shenyang on December 3.
					 Invited to see the performance were the commander and deputy commanders of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (CPLA), the commander of the Air Force of the area, the deputy political commissar of the area, the vice-governor of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government and other cadres of the area and the Liaoning provincial and Shenyang city people's governments.
					
					 Appreciating it were the consul general and officials of the DPRK Consulate General in Shenyang, the military attache of the DPRK embassy in Beijing and officers and men of the services and arms of the Shenyang Military Area of the CPLA and the special police unit.
					
					Put on the stage of the performance, started with the army songs of the two countries, were numbers representing the KPA servicepersons' unbounded loyalty to General Secretary Kim Jong Il and their ardent patriotism, matchless combat capability, revolutionary mettle and noble mental world. Among them were male vocal solo "The People Offer Glory to the Party", male chorus "A Soldier Hears Rice Ears Sway", guitar quartet ensemble "Song of Coastal Artillerymen", dance "My Heavy Machine Gun" and tap dance "The Appearance of Hero".
					
					 The performers also sang songs of the Chinese army in an emotional and vigorous manner.

articles.title: Mansudae Street Built in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mansudae Street Built in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- People who had moved into new houses in Mansudae Street in Pyongyang have begun living a happy life. The apartment buildings in the street were constructed on the bank of the River Pothong in a peculiar way and in perfect harmony with nearby magnificent edifices.
					Those who settled in the nice apartment houses this year replete with great change are very pleased with their new homes and other citizens of the capital, too, rejoice at their luck.
					
					The apartment buildings in the street were constructed splendidly as a pattern of housing construction in the Songun era.
					
					The interior of each unit with a floor space of a hundred and several dozen square meters was designed well to suit family life.
					
					It, fully furnished with heating system, water supply and drainage facilities, ventilation and calefaction devices, quality furniture and household utensils, has well-arranged living rooms, vestibule, kitchen, washroom and bathroom.
					
					It also has a store in a verandah to keep kimchi in winter.
					
					Residential quarters, with apartment buildings of different sizes and stories standing in a three-dimensional shape, were placed in a harmonious and coherent way, while giving prominence to each building's features.
					
					The buildings are colorfully decorated with various kinds of local-made coating materials and some of them have roofs of the Korean architectural style.
					
					Trees and flowers of good species have been planted in areas covering nearly a half of the total plottage and such public amenities as service facilities, kindergarten, nursery and park built in the street to fully afford convenience to the residents in their daily life.
					
					Modern apartment buildings with 100,000 units like those in Mansudae Street will appear in Pyongyang within a few years.

articles.title: Song and Story Telling Staged
articles.content:
Song and Story Telling Staged
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Song and story telling "My Dear Has Become Hero" created by the Kangwon Provincial Art Troupe was staged in Pyongyang from Dec. 1 to 5.
					 The performance impressively dealt with the heroic struggle and patriotic devotion of the women in Kumgang village who devoted their all to assisting soldiers of the Korean People's Army on the front during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Through the portrayal of members of the group for assisting the front waging sacred battles alongside the soldiers in the same trench to wipe out the enemy by carrying ammunition cases to the height despite gunfire  the performers truthfully represented the traits of assisting the army fully displayed during the war. 
					
					 Among the audience were officials of ministries and national institutions, creators and artistes in the fields of culture and arts, teachers and students in the field of art education and working people and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts S. Korea's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts S. Korea's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- South Korea is now disturbed by a frantic "human rights" racket.
					 Its puppets are busy with the moves to formally adopt a "law on human rights in north Korea" at the session of the "National Assembly" by setting in motion the "Grand National Party", the "Liberal Progressive Party" and other ultra-right conservative political parties in the wake of their ramming of the "bill on human rights in north Korea" through the "Sub-Committee for Examination of Bills of the National Assembly" on Nov. 27. 
					
					 The above-said farce clearly proves that the smear anti-DPRK human rights campaign of the puppet clique of south Korea has reached a graver phase.
					
					 Shortly ago, the puppets became one of the co-sponsors of a "resolution on human rights in north Korea" at the UN, toeing the line of foreign forces. By getting the "law on human rights in north Korea" adopted they seek to escalate the anti-DPRK human rights campaign. 
					
					 This is an intolerable insult and unpardonable politically motivated provocation to the DPRK as it is a revelation of the ambition of traitors to the nation to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK because they are steeped in it to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 They are the arch criminals who have reduced south Korea to a land with the world's worst human rights record. It is, therefore, preposterous for them to talk about the "human rights" issue of someone. 
					
					 The "human rights" issue does not exist under the dignified socialist system in the DPRK where the popular masses fully enjoy an independent life as a full-fledged master of the state and society with all kinds of political freedom and rights substantially guaranteed. 
					
					 It is, therefore, absolutely ludicrous for the puppets to let loose the above-said rhetoric.
					
					 Since the emergence of the present "government" fascist dictatorship has been revived in south Korea, turning it into a dark society deprived of elementary democratic freedom and rights and a tundra of human rights where dictatorship and suppression prevail.
					
					 New fascist repressive machines have been set up and the existing ones reinforced. Politically motivated investigations have been intensified and evil laws retrogressively revised. Patriotic democratic forces have been systematically suppressed and the crackdown upon the progressive media has been intensified and even people's protest actions for the right to existence have become targets of merciless suppression.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the international community terms south Korea a "land with the worst human rights record."
					
					 Finding themselves in a serious ruling crisis for having committed the above-said human rights abuses, escalated the inter-Korean confrontation and enforced fascist dictatorship, the puppet clique is now seeking a way out of it in the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket. 
					
					 The ultra-right conservative forces of south Korea are escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen over human rights issue, pushing the north-south relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe. This is a challenge to the magnanimous and sincere efforts of the DPRK to improve the north-south relations.
					
					 It is an unpardonable and grave hostile act for them to go mad with an anti-DPRK smear campaign under the pretext of human rights.
					
					 It is impossible to expect any improvement in the north-south relations as long as the anti-reunification forces in south Korea go frantic with the moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK, swimming against the trend of the times.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Value and Love Their Own Things
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Value and Love Their Own Things
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Every country and nation should value and love their own things if they are to live and develop independently, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 One should not look up to others and envy them, bereft of dignity and self-respect, but stand on one's own feet, valuing one's own things and  preserving them well. Only then one can feel the worth of a true life and pride as a human being and carve out one's destiny independently and creatively.
					
					 Something foreign cannot always agree with the taste and need of Koreans. Accordingly, if they introduce them recklessly, this will result in marring the national character peculiar to the Koreans and their pure soul as a homogeneous nation.
					
					 Everything including the land developed and defended by our ancestors and brilliant culture and national tradition is dear to us Koreans and their treasures. They should preserve and glorify all these precious treasures and tradition dear to the nation and hand them down to posterity and make efforts to create everything better for them to be bequeathed to it.  
					
					 A reunified country and future of a prosperous and powerful nation which will appear with the country becoming one are the greatest and most important things to be handed down by the Koreans to posterity.
					
					  Reunified Korea will stand as the strongest country in the world in name and reality and the Korean nation demonstrate its dignity as the great Kim Il Sung's nation shedding its rays thanks to the august name of the sun.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, serve as a blueprint for bringing earlier a bright future of the reunified country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, believing in their own strength without relying on others, and "By our nation itself" is the idea that heightens this spirit.

articles.title: Conjunto artistico del EPC ofrece funcion en Shenyang
articles.content:
Conjunto artistico del EPC ofrece funcion en Shenyang
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito Popular de Corea, de visita en China, ofrecio el dia 3 la funcion de convite en el Salon del Pueblo de Liaoning en Shenyang.
					  Entre los invitados figuraban el comandante, subcomandantes, el comandante de la fuerza aerea y el subcomisario politico, de la zona militar de Shenyang del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China, el teniente gobernador del Gobierno Popular de la provincia de Liaoning y otros cuadros de la misma zona militar y gobiernos populares de la provincia de Liaoning y de la ciudad de Shenyang.
					
					  Tambien disfrutaron el espectaculo el consul general y otros funcionarios del consulado general coreano acreditado en Shenyang, el agregado militar de la embajada coreana en China, los oficiales y soldados de ejercitos y armas de la zona militar de Shenyang del EPLCh y de las unidades de la policia armada.
					
					  En la escena iniciada con la interpretacion de los cantos militares de los dos paises se pusieron a la ejecucion el solo masculino "El pueblo glorifica al Partido", el coro masculino "Un soldado con oidos a las espigas de arroz que se agitan", el cuarteto de guitarra con voces "Cancion de artilleros costeros", la danza "Mi ametralladora pesada", la danza tap "La figura del heroe" y otras piezas, que reflejan la fidelidad infinita de los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y su calido patriotismo, incomparable combatividad, temperamento revolucionario y noble mundo espiritual.
					
					  Los ejecutantes interpretaron emocionante y vigorosamente tambien las canciones sobre el ejercito chino.

articles.title: ATCC critica la aprobacion del "proyecto de ley de DDHH del Norte"
articles.content:
ATCC critica la aprobacion del "proyecto de ley de DDHH del Norte"
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, se escenifica en el Sur de Corea la farsa de "derechos humanos" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Los titeres surcoreanos aprobaron el 27 de noviembre el llamado "proyecto de ley de derechos humanos del Norte" en el "Subcomite de Examen de los Proyectos de Ley de la Asamblea Nacional" e intentan instituir oficialmente esa "ley" en la reunion ordinaria del mismo organo legislativo en contubernio con el "Gran Partido Nacional", el "Partido Progresivo Liberal" y otros partidos politicos ultraderechistas y conservadores.
					
					Hace poco, ellos se ofrecieron como "co-proponente" del "proyecto de resolucion de derechos humanos del Norte" a la ONU adhiriendose a las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Y ahora tratan de recrudecer la campana intrigante anti-RPDC en el campo de DDHH al aprobar la ley arriba mencionada.
					
					Esto revela la ambicion de los elementos antinacionales de enfrentarse con la connacional RPDC, siendo insoportable insulto e imperdonable provocacion politica a ella.
					
					Resulta absurdo y ridiculo que los que cuestionan de una manera u otra los "derechos humanos" de alguien fueran precisamente los criminales principales que convirtieron el suelo surcoreano en la zona donde se violan de la peor manera los DDHH en este mundo.
					
					Ni siquiera puede surgir algun problema de "DDHH" en el muy digno regimen socialista de la RPDC donde las masas populares ejercen verdaderamente todas las libertades y derechos politicos y llevan una vida independiente siendo dignas duenas del Estado y la sociedad.
					
					Despues de la aparicion del actual "poder", el Sur de Corea se convirtio en un infierno de DDHH en que renacieron la dictadura fascista y la represion brutal y se eliminaron completamente las libertades y derechos democraticos.
					
					Fueron instaurados nuevamente y aumentados los aparatos de represion fascista, se cometen abiertamente los actos de inspeccion politica y se enmendaron de la peor forma las leyes infames. 
					
					Se reprimen y se eliminan de modo sistematico las fuerzas patrioticas democraticas y se intensifica la represion contra los medios de prensa progresistas. 
					
					Son reprimidas ferozmente hasta las protestas de los pueblos reclamando el derecho a la vida.
					
					No es casual que la sociedad internacional tildara al Sur de Corea como "region mas atrasada para los derechos humanos".
					
					La camarilla titere surcoreana, que cayo en la seria crisis de gobernacion debido a su politica de confrontacion fratricida con la RPDC y a la dictadura fascista, busca la salida en la campana anti-RPDC en el area de "DDHH".
					
					Desafiando a la magnanimidad y sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, las fuerzas ultraderechistas y conservadoras del Sur de Corea amplian la confrontacion fratricida al problema de DDHH llevando asi las relaciones N-S a una fase irremediablemente catastrofica.
					
					Esto significa imperdonable accion hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Mientras que las fuerzas anti-reunificacion del Sur de Corea recurren con fanatismo a la confrontacion con la RPDC navegando a contrapelo de la corriente de la epoca, no se puede esperar la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.

articles.title: Hay que apoyarnos en nuestra nacion, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Hay que apoyarnos en nuestra nacion, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Si cada pais y nacion desean vivir y desarrollarse de manera independiente, deberan apreciar y amar lo suyo.
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido en su edicion de este sabado y prosigue:
					
					Solo cuando el hombre se apoye en sus propias fuerzas apreciando y fomentando lo suyo sin envidiar a otros sintiendose digno y orgulloso, podra conocer el verdadero valor de su vida y forjar su destino de manera independiente y creativa.
					
					  Es imposible que todo lo exotico convenga al gusto y a la aspiracion de la nacion coreana. Por lo tanto, si se lo acepta a ciegas, seran enturbiadas la nacionalidad y el alma pura de la homogenea nacion coreana. 
					
					  Esta tierra explorada y defendida por los antecesores, la cultura brillante y las tradiciones nacionales, todo esto es el mas valioso patrimonio de la nacion coreana.
					
					  Hay que defender y glorificar tales riquezas y tradiciones y esforzarse por crear cosas mejores para legarlas a las generaciones venideras.
					
					  Lo mas grandioso e importante a ser legado a las posteridades es la patria reunificada y el futuro de la nacion que prosperara unida. 
					
					  Corea reunificada emergera como potencia mas poderosa del mundo y nuestra nacion sera dignificada como la grandiosa de Kim Il Sung, nombre del Sol. 
					
					  La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecucion de la primera, devienen los proyectos que permitiran a la nacion coreana traer con adelanto con las fuerzas unidas el futuro maravilloso de la patria reunificada. El espiritu de esos proyectos es redoblado por el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".

articles.title: Avenida Mansudae
articles.content:
Avenida Mansudae
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, rebosan de risa de felicidad las viviendas de la avenida Mansudae, construidas especificamente en el ano en que ocurre nuevo acontecimiento, armonizando con los edificios grandes y hermosos erguidos a la orilla del rio Pothong de esta capital.
					Para no hablar de los habitantes quienes se mudaron a las viviendas magnificas de nivel supremo, tambien todos los demas ciudadanos se regocijan como de las suyas.
					
					Esta avenida construida como modelo de la epoca del Songun es "hermosa" por dentro y por fuera.
					
					Cada vivienda muy confortable para la vida familiar tiene ciento y decenas de metros cuadrados en promedio.
					
					Son perfectos las habitaciones, antesala, cocina, cuarto de bano, condiciones de calefaccion, equipos de acueducto y alcantarillado, evacuacion de aire y calentadora de agua, etc. Las viviendas estan dispuestas de los muebles y articulos de la vida de nivel supremo.
					
					   E incluso, en el balcon hay hasta el almacen para guardar Kimchi invernal.
					
					Se distribuyeron armonicamente las manzanas de viviendas para que se asegure la uniformidad de toda la avenida aun manteniendo la peculiaridad de cada edificio y se combinan adecuadamente los rascacielos y viviendas de muchos pisos de grande y pequeno tamanos dando un efecto cubico. Las paredes de los edificios estan adornadas con varios materiales de construccion de fabricacion nacional y particularmente, los techos de algunos edificios son del estilo arquitectonico de la nacion coreana.
					
					Casi en la mitad del solar total se han formado las zonas de arboleda y de parques con los arboles de buena variedad y flores. En varios lugares de la avenida se construyeron de nuevo la red de servicio, jardin infantil y casa-cuna para garantizar al maximo la comodidad de la vida de los habitantes.
					
					Hoy, la avenida Mansudae sirve del modelo y el estandar para la construccion de viviendas en Corea.
					
					En la capital se construiran dentro de unos anos  las viviendas modernas para 100 mil familias como las de la avenida Mansudae.
